message: Hi Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $12,000. I believe this is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in your product, but $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,500. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $11,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000. This is a fair price, and it's the most I can offer. What do you say?

Hi Bob, I understand that $11,000 is the most you can offer, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you at that price. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11,250. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product will bring to your business.
